languages.text: "Это уже что-то. Я велю провести ревизию нашего оборудования и тщательнее следить за каналами связи. Однако это — всего лишь случайная удача неорганизованной, не имеющей понятия об искусстве войны еретической толпы".

"It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."
languages.original_text: "Это уже что-то. Я велю провести ревизию нашего оборудования и тщательнее следить за каналами связи. Однако это — всего лишь случайная удача неорганизованной, не имеющей понятия об искусстве войны еретической толпы".

traits.locale_text: "It's not much to go upon but it's actionable. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that are communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only an accidental success of a disorganised mob of heretics who have no concept of the art of war."

"It's not much to go upon but it's actionable. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that are communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only an accidental success of a disorganised mob of heretics who have no concept of the art of war."

"It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that are communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only an accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

"It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that are communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only an accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

"It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

"It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

languages.text: "Es ist nicht viel, aber es ist immerhin etwas. Ich befehle eine Überprüfung unserer Ausrüstung und sorge dafür, dass unsere Kommunikationskanäle ab sofort strenger bewacht werden. Es war jedoch nur ein zufälliger Erfolg eines ansonsten schlecht organisierten Mobs von Ketzern, die keinerlei Verständnis der Kunst des Krieges besitzen."
languages.original_text: "It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist nicht viel, aber es ist immerhin etwas. Ich befehle eine Überprüfung unserer Ausrüstung und sorge dafür, dass die Kommunikationskanäle ab sofort strenger bewacht werden. Es war jedoch nur ein zufälliger Erfolg eines ansonsten schlecht organisierten Mobs von Ketzern, die keinerlei Verständnis der Kunst des Krieges besitzen."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas grave, mais il ne faut pas l'ignorer. Je vais ordonner un audit de notre équipement et veiller à ce que nos canaux de communication soient surveillés de plus près à l'avenir. Cependant, ce n'était qu'un succès accidentel de cette bande d'hérétiques désorganisés, qui n'entendent rien à l'art de la guerre. »
languages.original_text: "It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas grave, mais il ne faut pas l'ignorer. Je vais ordonner un audit de notre équipement et veiller à ce que nos canaux de communication soient surveillés de plus près à l'avenir. Cependant, ce n'était qu'un succès accidentel de cette bande d'hérétiques désorganisés, qui n'entendent rien à l'art de la guerre. »

languages.text: “这只是个小问题，但确实是个问题。我会下令对我们的设备进行审查，确保我们的沟通渠道今后能得到更加密切的监控。不过，话说回来，他们只不过是一群毫无组织的异端分子罢了。或许他们偶然取得了一点点进展，但他们对战争的艺术一窍不通。”
languages.original_text: "It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

traits.locale_text: “这只是个小问题，但确实是个问题。我会下令对我们的设备进行审查，确保我们的沟通渠道今后能得到更加密切的监控。不过，话说回来，他们只不过是一群毫无组织的异端分子罢了。或许他们偶然取得了一点点进展，但他们对战争的艺术一窍不通。”

languages.text: 「大きなことではないが、何かはある。装備の監査を命じて、通信経路の監視を徹底させるつもりだ。とはいえ、異端者達の計画性のない暴走がたまたま成功したに過ぎず、奴らは戦争のやり方を理解してはいない」
languages.original_text: "It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

traits.locale_text: 「大きなことではないが、何かはある。装備の監査を命じて、通信経路の監視を徹底させるつもりだ。とはいえ、異端者達の計画性のない暴走がたまたま成功したに過ぎず、奴らは戦争のやり方を理解してはいない」

languages.text: «No es mucho, pero es algo. Encargaré una auditoría de nuestro equipamiento y me ocuparé de que nuestros canales de comunicación estén más controlados en el futuro. Sin embargo, no fue más que un éxito accidental de una multitud desorganizada de herejes que no entienden el arte de la guerra».
languages.original_text: "It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

traits.locale_text: «No es mucho, pero es algo. Encargaré una auditoría de nuestro equipamiento y me ocuparé de que nuestros canales de comunicación estén más controlados en el futuro. Sin embargo, no fue más que un éxito accidental de una multitud desorganizada de herejes que no entienden el arte de la guerra».

languages.text: "Çok büyütülecek bir mesele olmasa da ilgilenilmesi şart. Ekipmanımızın teftişten geçmesini emredip bundan böyle iletişim kanallarımızın daha yakından takibini sağlayacağım. Lakin bu durum; harp sanatından bihaber, başıbozuk bir kâfir güruhunun tesadüfi bir başarısından ibaret."
languages.original_text: "It's not much, but it is something. I will order an audit of our equipment and see to it that our communication channels are more closely monitored going forward. However, it was only the accidental success of an otherwise disorganised mob of heretics, who have no understanding of the art of war."

traits.locale_text: "Çok büyütülecek bir mesele olmasa da ilgilenilmesi şart. Ekipmanımızın teftişten geçmesini emredip bundan böyle iletişim kanallarımızın daha yakından takibini sağlayacağım. Lakin bu durum; harp sanatından bihaber, başıbozuk bir kâfir güruhunun tesadüfi bir başarısından ibaret."
